info.title: Information about the Youtube Video Downloader

features.fastTitle: Fast YouTube Video Downloader to MP3 | MP4 files
features.fastParagraph: Undoubtedly the fastest mp3 | mp4 video downloader you can find on the Internet.
features.freeTitle: Free and ad-free Youtube Video Downloader
features.freeParagraph: Free of charge and without annoying advertisements appearing with every download.
features.noSoftwareTitle: Download Youtube videos without the need to install any software
features.noSoftwareParagraph: No need to log in, no need to share your personal information,...
features.uploadTitle: Upload your music or videos to cloud storage
features.uploadParagraph: Upload your mp3 or mp4 file to your favorite cloud storage service.

steps.selectVideoParagraph: Search for your video on Youtube and copy its URL link.
steps.pasteLinkParagraph: Once you have copied the URL link, paste it into the search input of the downloader.
steps.downloadTitle: Download Youtube video to MP3 | MP4 file
steps.downloadParagraph: Click the download button to start downloading your video in mp3 | mp4 format.
steps.uploadTitle: Your music and videos always with you
steps.uploadParagraph: In the additional options, select cloud hosting and follow the steps below.

copyrightClaims.title: Copyright claims
copyrightClaims.information:
We respect the intellectual property rights of others and ask you to do the same. We do not permit copyright infringing activities and will immediately suspend copyrighted content (served via a publicly available web address / URL) from being converted and downloaded by your platform when kindly notified.


If you are a content creator / owner, copyright owner or an agent thereof and wish to disable the possible use of our website to convert your publicly available content, please send us an email request with the information below and we will blacklist the content in our system within 48 hours.


All notifications not relevant to us or ineffective under the law will receive no response or action thereupon.

An effective notification of claimed infringement must be a written communication to our email that includes substantially the following:

  • Identification of the copyrighted work that is believed to be infringed. Please describe the work and, where possible, include a copy or the location (e.g., a URL) of an authorized version of the work.
  • Identification of the material that is believed to be infringing and its location or, for search results, identification of the reference or link to material or activity claimed to be infringing. Please describe the material and provide a URL or any other pertinent information that will allow us to locate the material on the Website or on the Internet
  • Information that will allow us to contact you, including your address, telephone number and your e-mail address.
  • A statement that you have a good faith belief that the use of the material complained of is not authorized by you, your agent or the law.
  • A statement that the information in the notification is accurate and that under penalty of perjury that you are the owner or are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the work that is allegedly infringed.
  • A physical or electronic signature from the copyright holder or an authorized representative.

If your User Submission or a search result to your website is removed pursuant to a notification of claimed copyright infringement, you may provide us with a counter-notification, which must be a written communication to our above listed email and satisfactory to us that includes substantially the following:

  • Your physical or electronic signature
  • Identification of the material that has been removed or to which access has been disabled and the location at which the material appeared before it was removed or access to it was disabled.
  • A statement under penalty of perjury that you have a good faith belief that the material was removed or disabled as a result of mistake or misidentification of the material to be removed or disabled.
  • Your name, address, telephone number, email address and a statement that you consent to the jurisdiction of the courts in the address you provided in which the purported copyright owner is located.
  • A statement that you will accept service of process from the purported copyright owner or its agent.
